mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join sys_role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms != ''

select tm.MENU_ID, tm.PARENT_ID, tm.MENU_NAME, tm.path, tm.COMPONENT, tm.PERMS, tm.ICON, tm.type, tm.ORDER_NUM from t_menu tm inner join sys_role_menu srm on tm.menu_id = srm.menu_id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id inner join t_user tu on sur.user_id = tu.user_id where tm.type != '1' and tm.del_flag = '0' and tu.username = #{userName} group by tm.MENU_ID
